title: What are some of the best soft English songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't know how soft you want the suggestions to be, but here's a (really long) list (in no particular order):  Last Smoke Before The Snowstorm (the entire album) (Benjamin Francis Leftwich)Total Eclipse of the Heart, All Through the Night, Every Little Thing she does is Magic, Private Eyes, Turning Page (Sleeping At Last.)All I Want (Kodaline)Safe and Sound, Begin Again, Ronan, Last Kiss, Dear John, Clean, Breathe, Untouchable, Come in with the rain, Superstar, Treacherous, The Last Time, Sad Beautiful Tragic, Everything has Changed, Christmases when you were mine, Ours, Tim McGraw, Teardrops On My Guitar, Tied together with a smile, Invisible, Dark Blue Tennessee (TAYLOR SWIFT)Autumn Leaves, The A Team, Lego House, Kiss Me, Sunburn, Wake Me Up, Cold Coffee, One, All Of The Stars, Photograph, Tenerife Sea, Thinking Out Loud, I See Fire, All of The Stars (ED SHEERAN)Fallingforyou (The1975)Someone Like You (Adele)Oh My Stars, Open Your Eyes (Andrew Belle)Nothing's Gonna Change My Love For You (George Benson)Never Gone, Drowning (Backstreet Boys)Tee Shirt, Not About Angels (Birdy)Let Her Go (Passenger)Words (Boyzone)I Wanna Grow Old With You (Westlife)Have you ever really loved a woman, Heaven, Cloud Number Nine, Everything I Do, Lady in Red (Bryan Adams)My Heart Will Go On (Celine Dion) (A classic, really.)I Knew I loved you, Truly Madly Deeply (Savage Garden)Arms, Jar Of Hearts, A Thousand Years (Christina Perri)Carry You Home, You're Beautiful (James Blunt)I won't let go (Rascal Flatts)Little Things, Fool's Gold, Night Changes (One Direction)She's All I Ever Had, Private Emotion, Stay With Me (Ricky Martin)The Call (Regina Spektor)We Built This City (Aron Wright and Jill Andrews)Everybody Wants To Rule The World (Grey's Anatomy Soundtrack)Time after Time (The Wind and The Wave)Bottom of the Ocean, Stay, Butterfly Fly Away, When I Look At You (Miley Cyrus)93 Million Miles, The Woman I Love, I Won't Give Up, I'm Yours (Jason Mraz)Fix You, For You, The Scientist, Yellow (Coldplay)Cradled In Love (Poets of the Fall)1,2,3,4 (I Love You), Hey There Delilah, Rhythm of Love (Plain White T's)Be Still, My Heart (Peter Bradley James)Amazed (Lonestar)You and Me (Lifehouse)Bubbly, I Never Told You, Falling for you (Colbie Caillat)Budapest (George Ezra)La Vie En Rose (Daniela Andrade)White Flag, Thank You (Dido)Say Something (A Great Big World ft Christina Aguilera)Chasing Cars (Snow Patrol)How To Save a Life (The Fray)Leave Out All The Rest (Linkin Park)Come Here (Kath Bloom)

By soft if you mean soothing then here it is. Also the lyrics of each of them are so beautiful I suggest you hear them too : This beautiful cover by Miley Cyrus and Ariana Grande and yes they are live singing <3 Happy Hippie Presents: Don't Dream It's Over (Performed by Miley Cyrus & Ariana Grande) Imagination by Shawn Mendes. You should already be subscribed to him. Shawn Mendes - Imagination (Audio) All I ever need by Austin Mahone. Although he dedicated this to his fans. The song is powerful to make you feel all kinds of hidden emotions. Austin Mahone - All I Ever Need (Official Music Video) We don't talk anymore by Charlie Puth and Selena. It will remind you of all the crushes and exes for sure but in a good way. Charlie Puth - We Don't Talk Anymore [Official Audio] Will update soon

These are my few recent favourites Let it go - James BayHeart’s on Fire - PassengerGive me Love - Ed SheeranSend my love - Adele Photograph - Ed SheeranPostcards - James Blunt One Call Away -Charlie Puth7 Years - Lukas GrahamAnd my all time favorite My Immortal -Evanescence Also, Try exploring Soundcloud its a great community for music and great artists.

Thinking Out Loud by Ed Sheeran  Summer Time Sadness by Lana Del Ray  A Rush of Blood to the Head by Coldplay  Outlaws of Love by Adam Lambert  There are many more mentioned in other answers which are really good. As an added bonus - listen to this soundtrack called Light of the Seven from Game of Thrones.

I like these..Never say never - The FrayHoldin' on but letting go - Ross CoppermanLego House - Ed sheeranMy Immortal - EvanescenceCannonball - Damein RiceVolcano - Damein RiceHero - EnriqueApologize - One republicAll the right moves - One republicCome back when you can - Barcelona there are many but these are all i can think of right now.
1. Give Me Love 2. Thinking Out Loud 3. Photograph 4. All of the Stars In short, Ed Sheeran's songs are the most soothing ones! I am a huge fan.
Yellow by coldplay little girl by Enrique Iglesias daylight by marron5 paradise by coldplay A sky full of stars by Coldplay
